messages.content: Hi, the microwave I bought last week stopped working

Well, I was using the microwave last night to heat up some leftovers, and suddenly it just turned off. I tried unplugging it, waiting a few minutes, and plugging it back in, but it still won't turn on. I'm not sure what's wrong with it, but I'm disappointed that it stopped working so soon after purchase.
I am not sure that I can help. Try to call someone else
